name: Preaching Penguin
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by tributing 1 WATER monster you control that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck. All "Penguin" monsters you control gain ATK equal to the combined levels/ranks of all "Penguin" monsters on the field x100. (Quick Effect): You can tribute 1 "Penguin" monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Penguin" Xyz monster from your GY and if you do, attach this card to it as material. You can only use this effect of "Preaching Penguin" once per turn.
